team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet our expert tour guides and travel specialists

transportDetails.title: Toyota Car Rental - Travel in Style and Comfort
transportDetails.description1: Experience premium car rental services with our well-maintained Toyota fleet. Each vehicle is thoroughly inspected before every rental to ensure your safety and comfort throughout your journey.
transportDetails.description2: Our Toyota cars provide the perfect balance of reliability, fuel efficiency, and comfort, making them ideal for both short city trips and long-distance travel. With spacious interiors and modern features, you'll enjoy a smooth ride wherever your destination.
transportDetails.description3: All our rental vehicles come with comprehensive insurance coverage, 24/7 roadside assistance, and flexible pickup and return options to accommodate your travel schedule.

included.title: Included in Your Rental
included.item1: Comprehensive insurance coverage with collision damage waiver
included.item3: Unlimited mileage for complete freedom on your journey
included.item4: Basic GPS navigation system for easy directions
included.item5: Regular maintenance and safety inspections guaranteed

excluded.title: Not Included in Your Rental
excluded.item1: Fuel costs - return the car with the same fuel level as pickup
excluded.item2: Additional drivers fee - must be registered in advance
excluded.item3: Premium GPS devices or specialized equipment
excluded.item4: Toll fees, parking charges, or traffic violation fines
excluded.item5: Child seats or special accessories unless requested in advance

packageDetails.title: Experience the tour of excitement with the most adventurous activities.
packageDetails.tourAndTravel: Tour and travel refer to the activities related to planning, organizing, and experiencing trips to various destinations for leisure, exploration, adventure, or relaxation. Choose your destination based on your interests and preferences, whether it's a cultural experience, a natural adventure, historical exploration, or a beach vacation.
packageDetails.bookSuitable: Book suitable accommodation, which can range from hotels, resorts, hostels, vacation rentals, or even camping depending on your travel style and destination. Arrange transportation to and within your destination. This can include flights, trains, buses, rental cars, or even cruises.
packageDetails.included1: Meal as per hotel Plan and drinks free too.
packageDetails.included2: Return airport and round trip transfers.
packageDetails.included4: The above rates are on per day disposal basis.
packageDetails.included5: Enjoy Brussels day tours. Overnight Brussels.
packageDetails.excluded1: AC will not be functional on Hills or Slopes.
packageDetails.excluded3: Additional entry fees other than specified.
packageDetails.excluded4: Amsterdam canal cruise not included for basic.
packageDetails.highlight1: Our team of knowledgeable guides and travel experts are dedicated to making your journey memorable and worry-free
packageDetails.highlight2: Dive into rich cultures and traditions. Explore historic sites, savor authentic cuisine, and connect with locals.
packageDetails.highlight3: We take care of all the details, so you can focus on creating memories. Rest assured that your journey is in capable hands
packageDetails.highlight4: Sip cocktails on the beach as you watch the sun dip below the horizon.
packageDetails.highlight5: From accommodations to dining experiences, we select the best partners to ensure your comfort and enjoyment throughout your journey.
packageDetails.name: Name
packageDetails.reviewComment: A solution that we came up with is to think of sanitary pads packaging as you would tea. Tea comes individually packaged

packageSummary.warning: Warning: This itinerary includes days without a tour guide. The traveler is responsible for driving and navigation. Please ensure you can handle these responsibilities before booking.

packageSummary.disable_guide_message: Are you sure you want to remove the tour guide for This Day?
packageSummary.guide_benefit: A professional guide will accompany you throughout the day.
packageSummary.no_guide_info: You will explore this day on your own without a guide.

packageSummary.tour_guide_disabled: Tour guide removed for this day

packageSummary.order_description: Use this personalized guide to get your store up and running.

bookingSidebar.freeChanges: Free changes up to 24 hours before departure
bookingSidebar.minimumAdults: At least one adult is required

reviewsDetails.reviewNotice: All information will be collected through a form sent directly to the client after the tour duration is finished.
